The Fund seeks to achieve its objective by investing primarily in global noninvestment grade debt securities (including emerging markets), most of which are issued by corporate issuers, and which meet the Fund’s environmental, social and governance (ESG) criteria as further detailed below. Such securities are selected based on fundamental credit research, together with an assessment of risk to evaluate the relative attractiveness of an instrument.
